column1: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer. #FunFact #EiffelTower
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still edible. #HoneyFacts
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't. #FruitFacts #Botany
Octopuses have three hearts. Two pump blood to the gills, while the third pumps it to the rest of the body. #OceanFacts #Octopus
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus. It takes Venus longer to rotate once on its axis than to complete one orbit of the Sun. #SpaceFacts #Venus
Hot water freezes faster than cold water. This phenomenon is known as the Mpemba effect. #ScienceFacts #MpembaEffect
Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas. #Genetics #HumanBody
Sharks existed before trees. Sharks have been around for about 400 million years, while the earliest trees appeared around 350 million years ago. #HistoryFacts #Sharks
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes. #HistoryFacts #WarFacts
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto.' #LanguageFacts #FoodFacts
